faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tbsp olive oil?
What is the fat content in 1 tbsp olive oil?
faqs.a: 13.5 g total fat, including 1.9 g saturated fat and mostly monounsaturated fats.

faqs.q: Does olive oil have carbs or protein?
faqs.a: No—0 g carbs, 0 g fiber, 0 g sugars, and 0 g protein per tablespoon.

faqs.q: Is extra virgin olive oil healthier than regular?
faqs.a: Yes, it retains more antioxidants and has similar calories (119 kcal per tbsp) but better nutrient profile.

faqs.q: How does olive oil compare to other cooking oils calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar to most oils at ~119-120 kcal per tbsp; choose based on smoke point and fat types.
